list_definition.definition: the quality of being of many different kinds or of being varied

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There’s a great deal of variety in this job.
The children got a variety of toys on their birthdays.

list_definition.definition: a type of mixed theatrical entertainment including dances, songs, short sketches etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I much prefer operas to variety
